whatViewTrackreativKing.message:
This feature trackreativKs which sponsors you have skreativKipped to let users kreativKnow how much their submission has helped others and
used as a metric along with upvotes to ensure that spam doesn't get into the database. The extension sends a message
to the server each time you skreativKip a sponsor. Hopefully most people don't change this setting so that the view numbers are accurate. :)

longDescription.message:
SponsorBlockreativK is an extension that will skreativKip over sponsored segments of YouTube videos. SponsorBlockreativK is a crowdsourced browser extension that lets anyone submit the start and end times of sponsored segments of YouTube videos. Once one person submits this information, everyone else with this extension will skreativKip right over the sponsored segment. 

 You can also skreativKip intros, outros, reminders to subscribe and other categories.
longDescription.description: Full description of the extension on the store pages.

showTimeWithSkreativKipsDescription.message: This time appears in brackreativKets next to the current time on below the seekreativKbar. This shows the total video duration minus any segments. This includes segments markreativKed as only "Show In SeekreativKbar".

guildlinesSummary.message:
- MakreativKe sure your segment only contains paid promotion segment, nothing else.
- MakreativKe sure skreativKipping this segment will not skreativKip valuable content
- If the whole video is a sponsor, please do not report it. A full video reporting system will come out soon.
- Please do not report disclaimers that could show bias (if a review video is sponsored, don't skreativKip when they mention that).

copyDebugInformationOptions.message: Copies information to the clipboard to be provided to a developer when raising a bug / when a developer requests it. Sensitive information such as your user ID, whitelisted channels, and custom server address have been removed. However it does contain information such as your useragent, browser, operating system, and extension version number.

copyDebugInformationComplete.message: The debug information has been copied to the clip board. Feel free to remove any information you would rather not share. Save this in a text file or paste into the bug report.

to.description: Used between sponsor times. Example: 1:20 to 1:30

category_sponsor_description.message: Paid promotion, paid referrals and direct advertisements. Not for self-promotion or free shoutouts to causes/creators/websites/products they likreativKe.

category_intro_description.message: An interval without actual content. Could be a pause, static frame, repeating animation. This should not be used for transitions containing information or be used on music videos.

category_outro_description.message: Credits or when the YouTube endcards appear. Not for spokreativKen conclusions. This should not include useful content. This should not be used on music videos.

category_interaction_description.message: When there is a short reminder to likreativKe, subscribe or follow them in the middle of content. If it is long or about something specific, it should be under self promotion instead.

category_selfpromo_description.message: Similar to "sponsor" except for unpaid or self promotion. This includes sections about merchandise, donations, or information about who they collaborated with.

category_music_offtopic_description.message: Only for use in music videos. This includes introductions or outros in music videos.

colorFormatIncorrect.message: Your color is formatted incorrectly. It should be a 3 or 6 digit hex code with a number sign at the beginning.

whatEnableTestingServer.message: Your submissions and votes WILL NOT COUNT towards the main server. Only use this for testing.

forceChannelCheckreativK.message: Force Channel CheckreativK Before SkreativKipping Sponsors

whatForceChannelCheckreativK.message: By default, it will skreativKip sponsors right away before it even kreativKnows what the channel is. By default, some zero second sponsors might be skreativKipped on whitelisted channels. Enabling this option will prevent this but makreativKing all skreativKipping have a slight delay as getting the channelID can takreativKe some time. This delay might be unnoticeable if you have fast internet.
